com.vaadin.data.Container, com.vaadin.data.Container.Filterable, com.vaadin.data.Container.Indexed, com.vaadin.data.Container.ItemSetChangeNotifier, com.vaadin.data.Container.Ordered, com.vaadin.data.Container.PropertySetChangeNotifier, com.vaadin.data.Container.SimpleFilterable, com.vaadin.data.Container.Sortable, com.vaadin.data.Property.ValueChangeNotifier, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class UnitContainer
extends com.vaadin.data.util.IndexedContainer

This container holds all units that can be assigned to Work objects.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Matthias Gianfelice
See Also:
Squad, Vehicle, Work, Serialized Form
